Deputy Principal

Academic Affairs

Fostering academic excellence through innovative curriculum, quality assurance, and student-centered learning approaches.

Deputy Principal

Mrs. Lucy Makhokha

Technical Education, MEd Curriculum Development

Mrs Makhokha is a distinguished academic leader with over 18 years of experience in technical and vocational education. His expertise in curriculum development and quality assurance has been instrumental in positioning the college as a center of excellence in technical education. He has published extensively on competency-based training methodologies.

dp.academics@kongonitechnical.ac.ke
+254 788070303
Academic Block
Mon-Fri: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Academic Functions & Responsibilities

Curriculum Development

Design and review of academic programs to meet industry standards and market demands.

Academic Quality Assurance

Monitoring and maintaining high standards of academic delivery and assessment.

Faculty Development

Training and capacity building for academic staff to enhance teaching effectiveness.

Student Assessment

Coordination of examinations, assessments, and academic progression systems.

Academic Research

Promoting research activities and innovation among staff and students.

Academic Calendar

Planning and coordination of academic activities and institutional calendar.

Academic Achievements

  • Achieved 95% student completion rate across all programs
  • Introduced 8 new industry-aligned courses in 2024
  • Established partnerships with 15 industry leaders
  • Implemented competency-based training approach
  • Achieved 90% graduate employment rate within 6 months
  • Obtained accreditation for 12 technical programs from NITA
